content.question: In the first sentence of the third paragraph, the author describes needlework as “seemingly peculiarly adapted to the powers and tastes of women” primarily to

choices.label: signal the limitations of a cliché she plans to undermine
admit that trades do attract people of different capabilities
express uncertainty about what motivates women to choose certain jobs
offer examples of gender differences in the workplace

content.answer: signal the limitations of a cliché she plans to undermine

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
